SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class OrderItemController

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.OrderItemController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OrderItemController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the order item customization screen in the POS system. Allows users to customize drink orders by selecting ice levels, sweetness, toppings, and quantity before adding to cart.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderItemController

      public OrderItemController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading. Sets up default selections for ice and sweetness levels, loads modifier options from database, and initializes the order item.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths
      resources - the resources used to localize the root object

    • setMenuItem

      public void setMenuItem(int menuItemId)
      Sets the menu item to be customized by loading it from the database. Creates a new OrderItem with the loaded MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the database ID of the menu item to load

    • getCurrentOrderItem

      public com.gang60.models.OrderItem getCurrentOrderItem()
      Gets the current order item being customized.
      Returns:
      the current OrderItem

    • setOrderItem

      public void setOrderItem(com.gang60.models.OrderItem orderItem)
      Sets a complete order item for editing. Used when modifying an existing order item.
      Parameters:
      orderItem - the OrderItem to edit

    • testWithSampleData

      public void testWithSampleData()
      Test method to simulate selecting a menu item without the main dashboard. Creates a sample milk tea item with ingredients for testing purposes.
